amendment.description: To require the Department of Defense to support the security of Afghan women and girls during and after 2015.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1747 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1747 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Casey to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S4263-4270; text: CR S4268-4269) To require the Department of Defense to support the security of Afghan women and girls during and after 2015.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1747 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1747 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Casey to Amendment SA 1463.
